name: Cross Game
description:
Bored of feathery astronautics and battle crusades?
Here is a challenge for your brain!

The goal of the game is very simple - just repeat the pattern shown in the top of the playing field.
You do not need to be an artist - it is a puzzle game. Sounds easy? Try to play! The complexity of the game will certainly surprise you!

Game features:
- Eye candy graphics - sharp and clear!
- Easy and challenging at same time.
- Leaderboards. Higher difficulty - more points per game.
- Not another clone-game ;)
